name: Scape Run
description:
"In a futuristic reality, when you are sentenced to death, you can achieve your redemption by competing in the test of your life, 24 condemned will fight to be the first to reach the goal and thus obtain a new opportunity, if they are not reached before by the creatures that persecute them..."

Up to 24 players must reach the finish line, they have 5 minutes to do so and the first one to arrive wins, a sign will guide you throughout the game to know where to go, they will have to pass 3 levels:

MAZE

You will have to run through a maze and find the exit, the zombies can't run as fast as you but they know how to ambushe you unexpectedly.

LIBRARY

With great secrecy you must cross the library hiding from the zombies and without making noise. Be careful that someone close to you does not make noise or everything will end for both of you.

CAVE

Finally, a flooded cave, you must jump through the floating objects and quickly before they sink, get the key and open the door to freedom.
